welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Boerne, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our wonderful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport provides all necessary services for travelers, including check-in, baggage claim, and security.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: For private and charter flights, the airport offers a separate terminal with luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
